docs.title: Get a traﬃc ticket; you lose ﬁve points. Earn a city-level award, such as for committing a heroic act, doing exemplary business, or helping your family in unusual tough circumstances, and your score gets boosted by 30 points. For a department-level award, you earn ﬁve points. You can also earn credit by donating to charity or volunteering in the city’s program.
